text: RT @GiffordsCourage Congrats to @LupeValdez, @GinaOrtizJones & @ColinAllredTX for winning their primaries tonight! The domestic gag rule is an attack on our rights. The White House has no business deciding what a doctor or nurse can say to their patient about legal medical procedures. RT if you agree.

For years, armies of bank lobbyists & executives have groaned about how financial rules are hurting them. But there's a big problem with their story – banks are making record profits. Congress has done enough favors for big banks – the House should reject the #BankLobbyistAct. https://twitter.com/voxdotcom/status/998964298658525187 QT @voxdotcom Today, Congress will vote to weaken post-crisis financial regulations.
